mockProgram.name: Discover SCUBA
mockProgram.shortDescription: Below the surface, the adventure begins!  Come get wet & breathe underwater.  Have a SCUBA diving lesson and earn your Troop Specialty badge in the process.
mockProgram.description: Below the surface, the Adventure begins!  Come get wet & breath underwater.  Have a Scuba diving lesson and earn your Troop Specialty badge in the process. Learn basic skills like breathing, how to toss a Frisbee underwater, mask partial-flood & clearing, regulator removal & replacement, breathing from an alternative source, as well as√â secret hand signals!
